descriptions.and: AND returns 1 if both inputs are 1, and 0 otherwise.
descriptions.nand: NAND returns 1 if both inputs are 0, and 0 otherwise.
descriptions.nor: NOR returns 1 if both inputs are 0, and 0 otherwise.
descriptions.or: OR returns 1 if any input is 1, and 0 otherwise.
descriptions.xnor: XNOR returns 1 if both inputs are equal, and 0 otherwise.
descriptions.xor: XOR returns 1 if the inputs are different, and 0 otherwise.

initMessages: Binary numbers can be operated on! Next, you will find a series of logic gates.
See what happens when two binary numbers are input and you select a gate.
name: Logic gates
